page.title: 14Education - A School Day
page.content: I wake up at about 8 o'clock and get dressed. After breakfast I pack my lunch and drink into my bag and leave for school by car at about 8.30. At school we can play outside until 9.05. Then we come inside and settle down to our work. First of all we have Assembly, then do English or Maths until breaktime at 10.45, when we go out to play. We then work for an hour until dinner-time at 12 o'clock. I have a packed lunch, but some children have School Dinners. Afternoon School starts at 1.30 and we work at a variety of things, such as Art, Music, P.E., Craft, Environmental Studies until 3.45 when school ends. Sometimes we work right through our afternoon breaktime, which is 2.30 to 2.45. We like it when we go out on visits connected with our work, or have a film about it.
